description:
Hillary Clinton is losing ground in key swing states, according to a new poll that matches Mrs. Clinton against Republican presidential 2016 candidates or Republicans expected to enter the presidential race.

While the numbers do not look good for Mrs. Clinton, the poll is more of a boost to Mr. Paul, who wants to be seen as a Republican contender who could challenge Mrs. Clinton in the general election in 2016.
title: Early Poll: Hillary Clinton Would Face Tight Races in Iowa, Colorado
